description: This Dart file defines a Flutter widget for a referral screen in a mobile application. It allows users to submit a referral code or generate a new one, handling user input, network requests via ReferralsService, and updating the UI accordingly.

classes.name: ReferralsScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that manages the UI for submitting or generating referral codes.

classes.name: _ReferralsScreenState
classes.description: The State class for ReferralsScreen, handling user interactions, network calls, and UI updates.

methods.name: _submit
methods.description: Handles submission of referral code; calls the ReferralsService and updates UI based on success or failure.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for the referral screen, including input field, buttons, progress indicator, and results display.
